snippet: The Bank of Japan said it would stick to its plan despite slow progress toward its goal of 2 percent inflation. Cheap oil was blamed for low consumer prices.
lead_paragraph: The Bank of Japan said it would stick to its plan despite slow progress toward its goal of 2 percent inflation. Cheap oil was blamed for low consumer prices.

headline.main: Japan Stands Firm on Stimulus Program
headline.print_headline: Japan Stands Pat on Stimulus Program
